description: A collection of circles in a roughly trapezoidal formation with the wider edge on top; there is also a thin rectangular formation of circles extending from the top left corner of the trapezoidal formation. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is a thin yellow triangle where the trapezoidal and rectangular formations meet and a larger yellow triangle in the center of the trapezoidal formation.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
